overview:
International Startup Sales/Business Development veteran

Jonathan’s experience includes direct sales, selling through various types of channel organizations worldwide, and building Sales teams from the inception point outward. Jon has a documented record of quota attainment, a comprehensive understanding of the sales process, expertise in the development of account strategies, exceptional telephone, interpersonal and presentation skills, as well as a demonstrated ability to identify strategic business opportunities, and build profitable, long term relationships with senior-level executives and colleagues in order to create new products or lines of business, increase sales of existing products, and improve competitive positioning.

His skills in Business Development encompass performing competitive analysis, creating strategic relationships and directing new business services that complement existing offerings, in addition to driving the negotiation process; developing best practices for alliance execution; and providing input into product development in order to incorporate customer needs and expectations.

He excels in building relationships that result in recurring revenue and providing thought leadership to others in the company. Former Executive at Cisco Systems, and a number of worldwide Startups.
